name: Nissin Cup Noodles Soup, Beef Flavor, Microwaveable Paper Cups, Instant Ramen, 2.25 Ounce (Pack of 12)
short_description: AUTHENTIC FLAVOR HERITAGE: Experience the original instant ramen in a cup, brought to you by Nissin, creators of the culinary classic, Top Ramen
MICROWAVE SAFE: With our new paper cups you can now add water and microwave in 2:15 minutes! Perfect for anyone seeking a delicious, convenient meal or snack on the go
RICH BEEF AROMA: Savor the deep, hearty essence of beef complemented with a symphony of spices, making every bite a flavorful journey
UNIVERSALLY LOVED: A staple for families, students, and busy professionals alike. Ideal for after-school snacks, office lunches, or anytime hunger strikes
BULK CONVENIENCE: Comes in a case of 12, making it simple to stock your pantry with this comforting classic. Always be prepared for mealtime or sudden cravings
product_description: From the makers of Top Ramen and RAOH comes another classic—Nissin Cup Noodles in savory Beef flavor. This ready-in-minutes cup offers the ultimate convenience without skimping on taste. The original instant ramen in a cup, now with reduced sodium and no added MSG, remains a quick and portable meal perfect for on-the-go, after-school, or late-night snacking. Simply add boiling water, wait 3 minutes, and stir to enjoy a satisfying serving of hearty vegetables and rich beef-flavored broth. This 12-case package ensures you're stocked for whenever the craving hits.

short_description: BETTER FOR YOU – Our fat free and low sodium Gefen noodle soups are the perfect better for you soup in a cup option, allowing you to enjoy the uncompromised, real noodle soup flavor without worry.
KID FRIENDLY & BEYOND - Our soup is perfectly suited for children's lunch boxes, but also appeals to the discerning palates of adults, providing a delicious option for the entire family.
TRAVEL READY - Each cup comes with a convenient spork (spoon-fork), making it travel-friendly. Simply add hot water, and a steaming bowl of deliciousness is ready to be enjoyed.
VALUE PACK - This 12 cups value pack ensures that you'll have an ample supply of our irresistible soup on hand. Ideal for family enjoyment or as a quick snack solution.
CERTIFIED KOSHER - Certified Kosher (Dairy Free & Meat Free) For Year Round Use Excluding Passover

name: Lipton Soup Secrets Instant Soup Mix Noodle For a Warm Bowl of Soup Soup Made With Real Chicken Broth Flavor 4.5 oz
short_description: Lipton Soup Secrets Noodle Soup is a delicious and versatile instant soup mix
This soup mix is perfectly satisfying on its own or makes a great base for your hearty homemade soup recipe
Lipton Noodle Soup Mix is made with real chicken broth and natural flavors for a soothing and satisfying taste
A versatile meal or snack to enjoy, this delicious noodle soup mix has only 70 calories per serving
Enjoy a satisfying bowl of soup in just 5 minutes by adding water and cooking it on the stove-top or in the microwave
Warm, soothing, satisfying, and delicious, Lipton Soups have been there for you and your family since 1940
product_description: Enjoy soup at any time with Lipton Soup Secrets Soup Mixes. Our satisfying soups are made with real chicken broth and enriched flavorful noodles, and they’re a great way to please the entire family. Each box of Soup Secrets Soup mix makes 6-8 servings. Enjoy it as a satisfying bowl of soup any time of day for as few as 70 calories (or less) per one cup serving. Soup Secrets make it easy for you to make hearty, homemade soup for your family. Add one bag of instant soup mix to four cups of water and bring to a boil, cooking until noodles are tender. Add your favorite meats and/or vegetables for a delicious meal made in a faction of the time. For even faster prep, combine one pack of dry soup mix to four cups of water and microwave on high for 10-12 minutes or until noodles are tender. Bring the entire family together with Lipton Soups! Lipton Soups have been there for you and your family since 1940. When you’re craving something warm and satisfying for your family, reach for Lipton Soup Secrets, and enjoy the soul-restoring combination of flavorful broth and curly, swirly noodles. Soup Secrets are available in 4 delicious varieties: classic Noodle Soup, Extra Noodle Soup, Ring-O-Noodle Soup, and Chicken Noodle Soup with Diced White Chicken Meat.

short_description: This rich, decadent instant ramen soup cup is ready in just minutes, yet tastes just like the best bowl of ramen at a ramen bar.
Enjoy it on its own or top it with your favorite ramen toppings like chicken breast cutlets, fried garlic, and green onions.

Want to know what makes our ramen so awesome? It's got ridiculously rich broth, simple ingredients, organic steamed noodles made in-house from scratch, and 40% less sodium per ounce than the leading brand of ramen.
